quotes: Paise kamao, lekin sthayi tareeke se 🌱
Paise secure karna sirf shauk nahi, yeh bhi self-care hai 💅
Tumhare finance ko vibe check pass nahi karna, bas behtar hona hai 📈
Plot twist: Tum ab paise ko sahi tareeke se sambhalne wale ho 💸
Budget wali zindagi jee rahe hain, koi shak nahi ✨
Main character ki energy hai paise ko manage karna 💫
Yeh financial freedom ki vibes de raha hai 🔥
Kha bhi rahe hain aur bacha bhi rahe hain 🍜
Dost, aapki paison ki journey yahi se shuru hoti hai ✌️
Yeh tumhara villain era hai karz ko crush karne ka 😈
FullScreenLoader.initialQuote: Kha bhi rahe hain aur bacha bhi rahe hain 🍜
FullScreenLoader.loading: Aapke vitteey bhavishya ko load kiya ja raha hai...

install.title: Humara App Install Karein

description.default: Sarvottam anubhav ke liye, hum aapko apni home screen par shettayyy app ko install karne ki salah dete hain!

ios.title: iOS par yeh app install karne ke liye:

steps.1: Safari mein Share button par tap karein
steps.2: Niche scroll karein aur "Add to Home Screen" par tap karein
steps.3: Confirm karne ke liye "Add" par tap karein

ios.step2: Niche scroll karein aur "Add to Home Screen" par tap karein
ios.step3: Confirm karne ke liye "Add" par tap karein

android.step1: Browser menu button par tap karein
android.step2: "Install app" ya "Add to Home screen" par tap karein

install.learnMore: App install karne ke baare mein aur adheek jaane

installGuide.title: App install karne ke liye nirdesh
installGuide.description: Apne device par hamara app install karne ke liye in video guide ka paalan karein. Prasangik nirdesh dekhne ke liye apna platform chunen.
installGuide.noGuides: Chune huwey platform ke liye app install karne ke liye no nirdesh karne ke liye.

errorList.item2: Pramanikaran link ki samay seema samapt ho gayi hai
errorList.item3: Sign-in ke dauran ek takneeki samasya thi

buttons.tryAgain: Phir se sign in karne ka prayas karein
